description: Working on some cool stuff so you can plan your next vacation

Improved the durability of webhooks by moving webhook generation in-band, enhancing reliability and timeliness while decreasing failure rates. Refactored Stripe's Internal API DSL for code de-tangling and efficiency.

As part of the Monetizer team within Ads Billing, worked on 'Crush' to provide unified granular data for revenue, billing, and usage for Ads products. Utilized FlumeJava to scale processing from 6 million rows per month to 30 billion rows. Worked on the Geo Moderation team, implementing road geometry-related user-generated content using C++.

Worked as a backend developer in the content platform team, building robust, secure, and scalable microservices for Hotstar OTT services. Implemented show and episode enhancements as part of the Hotstar X project, collaborating with the product team to create new customer experiences.
Worked on the Fastag team in a microservice-based architecture. Designed an automated system to identify incorrect toll deductions and implemented a near real-time auto-recharge mechanism.
